testcase.name: Verify that when Organization-Admin clicks on "Write your post here" in Newsfeed screen,
testcase.system-out: Given Organization-Admin inserts valid username "mohamed.amr+test1@parent.cloud".passed And inserts valid password "12345678".......................................passed When clicks on submit button................................................passed Then Dashboard webpage is displayed by default..............................passed When Organization-Admin clicks on Newsfeed tab..............................passed And clicks on "Write your post here"........................................passed And clicks on "search for recipients".......................................passed And writes "first automated post here"......................................passed
